mapper.insert: insert into stock_out (out_id, out_no, part_id, warehouse, out_type, quantity, recipient, department, service_order_no, out_date, operator, reason, created_time, remarks) values (#{outId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
